Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL ?; PAINTED; FAYENCE
Name: Gnomon
Description: The gnomon gift, bearing the name of the pharaoh Nepherites I, is possibly the oldest known example. This portable device was normally equipped with a plumb line for verifying height. The shadow of the cube was projected on a graded scale on the oblique part and thus indicated the hour. It is probably a votive object, in view of the absence of grades.
